LanguageData.PRF_Shearer.label: shearer
LanguageData.PRF_Shearer.description: A station with motion detecting industrial-size shearing clippers. Swiftly and automatically extracts wool from your colony's animals.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure the animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the sheared creature is standing.
LanguageData.PRF_Milker.label: milker
LanguageData.PRF_Milker.description: A station equipped with servo-motorized tubes, which seek out mammary glands to milk your farm animals.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the milked creature is standing.
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester.label: generic animal harvester
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester.description: A sophisticated facility boasting a variety of tools to gently extract any kind of animal products, even from the more exotic species.\n\nKeep it stocked with food to lure animals in for processing. Drops the produce where the animal is standing.
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester_II.label: spacer animal harvester
LanguageData.PRF_GenericAnimalHarvester_II.descriptio: This is a advanced animal harvester that can harvest a wide range of products from animals, it has a frontfacing pull zone that can be made larger with powerbooster. and if RimFridge is installed its cooled to keep food from spoiling over time.
LanguageData.PRF_Slaughterhouse.label: Slaughter House
LanguageData.PRF_Slaughterhouse.description: An automatic slaughterhouse. Uses cameras and a rudimentary computer to keep track of your animal population, and to keep it within your defined limits.
LanguageData.PRF_RecipeDatabase.label: recipe database
LanguageData.PRF_RecipeDatabase.description:
The Portable Recipe Database can import recipes from nearby worktables. Afterwards, when reinstalled near assembler(s), it will upload its recipes to them.

Blue cells are import range for the database.

Uploaded recipes and bills will be lost if the database is moved or destroyed.

I wonder what all these other buttons do...
LanguageData.PRF_TypeOneAssembler_I.label: assembler
LanguageData.PRF_TypeOneAssembler_I.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a computer. Despite being called an assembler, it's also capable of simpler procedures such as cutting stone blocks, and refinery work.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

White cell is input range, Blue cell are db range, Yellow cell is output
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_I.label: adaptive assembler
LanguageData.PRF_TypeTwoAssembler_I.description:
An automatic assembler controlled by a primitive AI.

The simple artificial neural network enables it to learn; to be more precise and efficient at individual recipes. Slowly overwrites currently unused recipe algorithms, as it has limited processing and memory capacity.

Downloads recipes from an adjacent recipe database.

White cell is input range, Blue cell are db range, Yellow cell is output
LanguageData.PRF_4k_Battery.label: 4k battery
LanguageData.PRF_4k_Battery.description: A battery capable of storing 4000 watt days of power. it has a efficiency of 50% which mean it will take 8k WD to charge it.
LanguageData.PRF_16k_Battery.label: 16k battery
LanguageData.PRF_16k_Battery.description: A battery capable of storing 16000 watt days of power.
LanguageData.PRF_64k_Battery.label: 64k battery
LanguageData.PRF_64k_Battery.description: An efficient waterproof superposed-cell battery capable of storing 64000 watt days of power. Spdskatr Industries is not responsible for any damage caused by short circuits.
LanguageData.PRF_256k_Battery.label: 256k battery
LanguageData.PRF_256k_Battery.description: A very efficient waterproof AI-based battery capable of storing 256000 watt days of power. Cannot break down. Also very beautiful. Spdskatr Industries is not responsible for any damage caused by short circuits.
LanguageData.PRF_ResearchTerminal.label: factory research terminal
LanguageData.PRF_ResearchTerminal.description:
This is a linkable like a multianalyzer but this one have have some special functions.
It work as a Simple research table and can research any research not require HitechResearchBench.
It will ofcourse also boost your research speed.
This is needed for Late tiers Factory research.
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.label: robotic machining table
LanguageData.TableRoboticMachining.description: A work station for creating parts, frames and more for automation buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerI.label: industrial cooker
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerI.description:
An assortment of food processing modules which can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! 

Only cooks simple foods but with a cooking level of 8 at 1x speed 

White cell is input
Yellow are output cell
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerII.label: modern autocooker
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerII.description:
An improved assortment of food processing modules which can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! 

 1.5x speed 
 5 cleanliness 
 cook level 12
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerIII.label: spacer cooker
LanguageData.PRF_SelfCookerIII.description:
An assortment of food processing modules which can peel, mince, chop, mix, cook, steam, grill, and bake ingredients into more or less delicious meals and other edible products.

Never ruin a meal again with your one-stop solution to satisfy all your colony's sustenance needs. Just look at it go! 

 2x speed 
 20cleanliness 
 cook level 20
LanguageData.PRF_MeatGrinder.label: meat grinder
LanguageData.PRF_MeatGrinder.description: Precise grinder which processes corpses into piles of usable materials: meat, leather, etc.
LanguageData.PRF_FermentingBarrel.label: fermenting tank
LanguageData.PRF_FermentingBarrel.description: Fully automated fermenting. Self-regulates temperature to maintain the best quality.
LanguageData.PRF_SelfPrepper.label: industrial food processor
LanguageData.PRF_SelfPrepper.description: A machine designed to boil, grind, or mill raw food resources into ingredients more suitable for cooking and brewing.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_I.label: Drone Cultivator
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_I.description:
First automated cultivator, utilising simple drones to sow, water and harvest your crops. It is slow but still represents a good first step into automated farming.

Base Stats:
Drones: 1
WorkArea: 11x11
Jobtypes: Growing
Worktime: 1hour shifts
Skill lv.: 10
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II.label: Drone Cultivator mkII
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II.description:
MkII Automated cultivator. By using improved drones to do your agriculture jobs, they now have improved functions to offer.They will haul to a stockpile, I/O, crate if its within range.

Base Stats:
Drones: 2
WorkArea: 11x11
Jobtypes: Growing + hauling
Worktime: fulltime
Skill lv.: 15
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II_sun.label: Drone Cultivator mkII(sun lamp)
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_II_sun.description:
MkII Automated cultivator. By using improved drones to do your agriculture jobs, they now have improved functions to offer.They will haul to a stockpile, I/O, crate if its within range. This one have a sunlamp and WILL upgrade your drones with research to lv 20.

Base Stats:
Drones: 2
WorkArea: 11x11
Jobtypes: Growing + hauling
Worktime: fulltime
Skill lv.: 15
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_III.label: Drone Cultivator mkIII
LanguageData.PRF_DroneCultivator_III.description:
MkIII Automated cultivator. By using improved drones to do your agriculture jobs, they now have improved functions to offer. They will haul to a stockpile, I/O, crate if its within range.

Base Stats:
Drones: 5
WorkArea: 11x11 - 33x33
Jobtypes: Growing + hauling
Worktime: fulltime
Skill lv.: 20
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_I.label: Mechanites Cultivator
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_I.description:
This is a hightech Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It has a Full spectrum LED sun light build in its sides. it will also output onto a cell for further processing.

Base Stats:
Drones: none, 1 working cell
WorkArea: 11x11
Worktime: fulltime
Speed: 50
Skill lv.: 20
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Sun.label: Mechanites Cultivator (sun lamp)
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Sun.description:
This is a hightech Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It has a Full spectrum LED sun light build in its sides. it will also output onto a cell for further processing.

Base Stats:
Drones: none, 1 working cell
WorkArea: 11x11
Worktime: fulltime
Speed: 50
Skill lv.: 20
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Xl.label: Mechanites XL Cultivator
LanguageData.PRF_OldTypeCultivator_Xl.description:
This is a hightech XL Cultivator that houses worker mechanites, that will sow, harvest and maintain a growzone or hydroponics setup. It has a Full spectrum LED sun light build in its sides. it will also output onto a cell for further processing.

Base Stats:
Drones: none, 1 working cell
WorkArea: 22x22
Worktime: fulltime
Speed: 12 (5x faster)
Skill lv.: 20
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_I.label: Sprinkler
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_I.description: A building that waters plants in an expanding radius, increasing their growth by one hour per round. Effects are stackable
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_II.label: Sprinkler mkII
LanguageData.PRF_Sprinkler_II.description: A Upgraded sprinkler using advanced AI to stimulate plants fertilizer needs in each sprinkle, this leads to a improved growrate. Increasing their growth by 2 hour per round. Effects are stackable
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.label: Mini Workshop helper station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelper.description: A mini workshop helper capable of haul, flick, firefight and clean your workshop within a range(can be expanded with powerslider)
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.label: drone column
LanguageData.PRF_MiniDroneColumn.description: A column filled with 2 handy drones that can clean your throneroom or eatinghall, kill fires, refuel your braziers and move your stuff away from the floor. It's also capable of holding a roof, and looks quite nice.
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.label: Industrial Stoneworks
LanguageData.PRF_StoneWorks.description: A CNC router like automated machine that are capable of turning stone into bricks and even abit mid skilled art too. \nArt level: 10
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.label: Smart Recycler
LanguageData.PRF_Recycler.description: A recycler that turns almost any apparel and weapons into usable resources, at the cost of some lost materials.
LanguageData.PRF_MrTsArtMachine.label: T's Art Machine
LanguageData.PRF_MrTsArtMachine.description: Thornsworth's Art machine, capable of producing art with a art level of 14.\nThorny had a big passion for 3D printers and Producing art with hes large army of assemblers, he made this machine before he passed away, and now its finally added to produce a army of sculptures in future.\nRIP Thornsworth 2020
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.label: Metal Refinery
LanguageData.PRF_MetalRefinery.description: A metal refinery able to produce rare metals through polymer lamination
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.label: Part Assembler
LanguageData.PRF_PartAssembler.description: This is a preset assembler that create parts for further production like components, prf parts and more.
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.label: Blast Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceI.description:
A simple early stage Furnace with minimal automation. Burns unwanted apparel and smelts raw rescourses into useful materials.

Automatically takes input materials (or trash) within the white cells surrounding the furnace - it has an input range of one cell - and outputs(yellow cell) any finished metals into a cell you may specify.
(remember to remove quicly so it dont clog up)
 Use wood to smelt
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.label: industrial Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceII.description: This Second Furnace is an advanced industrial Furnace capable of burning items and smelting raw resources into useful materials\nUses electricity to reduce wood amount for burning
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.label: Electric Furnace
LanguageData.PRF_FurnaceIII.description:
Advanced Furnace capable of burning stuff and smelting raw resources into useful materials, faster than previous iterations.

(This furnace is the best and fastest in Project RimFactory.)

Imports any recipe from the Electric Smelter and the Crematorium.
LanguageData.PRF_FuelingMachine.label: fueling machine
LanguageData.PRF_FuelingMachine.description:
A Simple Refueling machine thats capable of refueling Generators, braziers, mortarts and everything else that uses normal refuelable/mortar comp.
It can also fuel some modded types eq. SoS, CE...
Will pull in from everything in white cells and fuel what in front of it(the yellow cell points to the "front").

(Works with "Refualable comp" buildings)
Also capable of Fueling mortars with shells
LanguageData.PRF_SmartHopper.label: Smart Hopper
LanguageData.PRF_SmartHopper.description:
A Intellegent hopper that can pickup stuff around it, withing its range (white cells)
It can toggle to only pickup covered stockpile cells or pickup from ground.
It will not actively push into anything it just hold on to things so assembler and such can pickup.
Can also pickup from belts.
It Can't feed a Nutrient paste dispenser yet...
LanguageData.PRF_GrowzonePuller_I.label: growzone Puller
LanguageData.PRF_GrowzonePuller_I.description: Attach to end of grow zone, will pull set items within selected growzone. Will not pull from neighboring grow zones.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_I.label: Item Puller mkI
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_I.description: A Puller That Pull items from A to B. Place it down and switch it on to start pulling from stockpiles, I/O, belts, crates Into I/O, belts, storage... Very flexible in its connection!\n\nREMEMBER to turn it on after placing!
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II.label: Item Puller mkII
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II.description: A upgraded puller which run at a higher speed than mkI puller. pulling from stockpiles, I/O, belts, crates Into I/O, belts, storage... Very flexible in its connection!
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Side.label: Item Angle Puller
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Side.description: A 90 degree angled Puller that moves items from A to B. Similar to normal puller, but allowing turns!\nYou can swap the direction (left/right) after placing.
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Wall.label: Wall Item Puller
LanguageData.PRF_SimplePuller_II_Wall.description:
An in-wall item Puller that pushes items from A to B.

This one is placed through a wall, and is well insulated enough for use in freezers and secure enough for prisons where you dont want anyone crawling through.

Remember you still need to turn it on!
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_I.label: conveyor belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_I.description: Conveyor belts transport items from one end to the other. It will dump into Storage or stockpiles - or just leave stuff on the ground when the belts end.\nBut because they are rather unsophisticated, they will happily dump whatever they have off the end if there is room.\nA corner can be made by just leading the belt into the side of another belt and will seamlessly continue.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_II.label: Fast conveyor belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_II.description: Fast Conveyor belts transport items from one end to the other. This moves at 2x speed of Normal belts. It will dump into Storage or stockpiles - or just leave stuff on the ground when the belts end.\nBut because they are rather unsophisticated, they will happily dump whatever they have off the end if there is room.\nA corner can be made by just leading the belt into the side of another belt and will seamlessly continue.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_III.label: Express conveyor belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Simple_III.description: Express Conveyor belts transport items from one end to the other. This moves at 3x speed of Normal belts or 1.5x of Fast belts. It will dump into Storage or stockpiles - or just leave stuff on the ground when the belts end.\nBut because they are rather unsophisticated, they will happily dump whatever they have off the end if there is room.\nA corner can be made by just leading the belt into the side of another belt and will seamlessly continue.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Wall_I.label: Wall Belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Wall_I.description: Moves items - through walls! You can use these to traverse walls or move items along inside them. When items hit the end, they will move out onto the ground, as long as there is room.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_UG_I.label: underground belt
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_UG_I.description: Underground Conveyor Belts carry items in tunnels under the ground. To move items into the subterrainian passages, you need to use the Underground Conveyor Entrance and Exit.\nThis can move under Walls, machines and other belts without connecting.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_UG.label: Underground belt entrance
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_UG.description: Connects ground conveyor belts to underground conveyors. This is the entrance to the subterrainian passages.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_Floor.label: Underground belt exit
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Connector_To_Floor.descript: Connects the underground conveyor belt to the above-ground conveyor. This is an exit back to the surface, and will drop items on the floor if there is no conveyor.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_I.label: conveyor splitter
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_I.description: An automated unit that directs items on a conveyor belt in different directions depending on filters, handled by a very basic AI. If no filters are set, it will simply split where items passing through go.
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_UG.label: underground splitter
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_UG.description: Splitting features of a normal splitter without the surface eyesore
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_Wall.label: wall splitter
LanguageData.PRF_Conveyor_Splitter_Wall.description: A conveyor splitter unit built into the walls. This one will hand off items to wall belts and Overground ones.
LanguageData.PRF_MineShaft.label: Mine Shaft
LanguageData.PRF_MineShaft.description: Early mine shaft entrance, which let you set a target mine operation where pawn will go into the mountain and mine out what you desire, it also have a slim chance of finding rare/junk bonus items while operating.\nShould be placed in a mountain wall to operate.(may conflict with replace stuff mod)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.label: Auger drill(T1)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkI.description: An early automated quarry that continuously extracts resources from the ground, including rock chunks, materials and components. Produces a random resource roughly once every 8 hours.(can cause Infestation!)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkII.label: Pulse Drill(T2)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkII.description: An automated quarry that continuously extracts resources from the ground, including rock chunks, materials and components. Produces a random resource roughly once every 3 hours.(can cause infestation)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.label: Random Pulse Drill(T3)
LanguageData.PRF_DeepQuarry_mkIII.description: This is last tier random ore mining quarry, this one will not create infestation and will only mine rare ores no stones.
LanguageData.PRF_BillTypeMiner_I.label: Plasma Drill(T3)
LanguageData.PRF_BillTypeMiner_I.description: With newest Spacer Technology auto mining have been more precise then ever, and can now adjust what ores to mine for and even balance power for speed. It will set primary ore type and get bonus in rare ores and junk
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.label: Wall Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_WallLight.description:
An electrical wall lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

These lamps are unlike other wall lamps, multisided and atlased to fit different walls
 Good for small rooms or other tight packed rooms
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.label: Sun Wall Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_SunWallLight.description: An industrial wall lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.\n\nThis is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.label: Industrial Lamp
LanguageData.PRF_IndustrialLamp.description:
An electrical lamp that lights an area.
This lamp are capable to light up a huge aread both indoor and outdoor to light up your factory hall.
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_Floorspotlight.label: Floor Spotlight
LanguageData.PRF_Floorspotlight.description:
An electrical lamp that lights an area.
This lamp are capable to be used in and outdoor.
Also capable of changeing color when placed if colored light are researched

This is added by Project RimFactory
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafterSimple.label: auto-assembler Mk-1
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafterSimple.description: The first version of the auto-assembler, able to craft with the skill and speed of a level 5 crafter. Place this on a workbench's interaction spot with the arrow facing the workbench. The auto-crafter can also do art, but its database of art is very limited and will not be able to produce masterpieces.
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafter.label: auto-assembler Mk-2
LanguageData.PRF_AutoCrafter.description: The auto-assembler is the backbone of Project S.A.L., a small but powerful building capable of autonomously crafting recipes. It is equivalent to a level 12 crafter.
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMachine.label: The Art Machine
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMachine.description: Pumps out art like a hose pumps out water. Level 8 art.
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMaster.label: The Art Master
LanguageData.PRF_TheArtMaster.description: Pumps out art like a violent volcanic eruption pumps out lava. Level 18 art.
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssembler.label: overclocked auto-assembler
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssembler.description: Produces work at the standard of a level 1 dunce, but works extremely quickly.
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssemblerII.label: overclocked auto-assembler mkII
LanguageData.PRF_OverclockedAutoAssemblerII.descripti: Produces terrible quality items, though it does this so quickly it might not matter
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoCooker.label: AutoCooker S.A.L
LanguageData.PRF_SALAutoCooker.description: Although the auto-assembler performs cooking to a decent level, the auto-cooker is both faster and more accurate in its food production, capable of reaching a level 12 standard.
LanguageData.PRF_GodlyCrafter.label: Godly S.A.L Crafter
LanguageData.PRF_GodlyCrafter.description: Works so quickly, it defies all expectation. Perfect for mass-producing high quality items. May or may not incinerate the universe\nThis might be first step into insanity?!#..
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_I.label: small wooden crate
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_I.description: (Tier 1 crate) A small crate that can store 16 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_II.label: wooden crate
LanguageData.PRF_WoodCrate_II.description: A giant crate that can store 32 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_I.label: small steel crate
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_I.description: A small steel crate that can store 64 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_II.label: steel crate
LanguageData.PRF_SteelCrate_II.description: A giant crate that can store 128 stacks. Items stored in the crate do not deteriorate.
LanguageData.PRF_DigitalStorageUnit_I.label: digital storage unit
LanguageData.PRF_DigitalStorageUnit_I.description: Stores up to 768 stacks. Consumes 10 W of power per stack of items. When your colony loses power, items already inside will be safe, but the building will not be able to store more.
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_I.label: I/O Port
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_I.description: (tier 3) \n A Connection port for your storage Cargo Platforms. It can be set to Input/output from any Platform remotely in any range within the map.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampArrow.label: Yellow Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.PRF_RedFloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_RedFloorLampArrow.label: Red Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.PRF_GreenFloorLampArrow.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_GreenFloorLampArrow.label: Green Floor Sign Arrow
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampX.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorLampX.label: Red Floor Sign X
LanguageData.PRF_FloorInput.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorInput.label: Input Sign
LanguageData.PRF_FloorOutput.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_FloorOutput.label: Output Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconClothes.label: Clothes Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconSkull.label: Skull Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconToxic.label: Toxic Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPower.label: Power Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGears.label: Gears Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGun.label: Gun Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconGasmask.label: Gasmask Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconFire.label: Heat Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconCold.label: Cold Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconDanger.label: danger Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconExit.label: exit Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconPrison.label: Prison Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconResearch.label: Research Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconHospital.label: Hospital Sign
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.description: Weak florescent sig, can be placed on floor or on top of machines or other buildings to show guidance.
LanguageData.PRF_IconBarbedWire.label: BarbedWire Sign
LanguageData.PRF_RoboticArm.label: robotic arm
LanguageData.PRF_RoboticArm.description: A robotic arm powered by an electric motor. Used in the construction of some automation buildings.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_I.label: weak AI chip
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_I.description: A tensor processing unit containing the most rudimentary AI. Used for Early machines and robots.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_II.label: Advanced AI core
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_II.description: A advanced processing unit containing hi-tech AI, which is used for advanced machines and robots.
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_III.label: Qubit processor
LanguageData.PRF_ElectronicChip_III.description: In quantum computing, a qubit or quantum bit is the basic unit of quantum informationâ€”the quantum version of the classical binary bit physically realized with a two-state device. A qubit is a two-state quantum-mechanical system, one of the simplest quantum systems displaying the peculiarity of quantum mechanics.
LanguageData.PRF_DroneModule.label: drone module
LanguageData.PRF_DroneModule.description: A dormant quadcopter frame capable of low-altitude flight.
LanguageData.PRF_DataDisk.label: recipe data disk
LanguageData.PRF_DataDisk.description: A roll of magnetic tape. Apparently it can hold 64 megabytes. How primitive... Its used to create Recipe DataBases(project rimfactory)
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_I.label: simple machine frame
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_I.description: The empty shell of a small automation building.
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_II.label: machine frame
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_II.description: The empty shell of a medium-sized automation building.
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_III.label: adv. machine frame
LanguageData.PRF_MachineFrame_III.description: The empty shell of a advanced automation building.
LanguageData.PRFDrone.label: drone
LanguageData.PRFDrone.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_30k.label: circuit breaker (30k)
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_30k.descriptio: A set of automatic circuit breakers. Handles up to 30000 Wd discharge, will flick off if tripped.
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_300k.label: circuit breaker (300k)
LanguageData.Building_RTCircuitBreaker_300k.descripti: A set of automatic circuit breakers. Handles up to 300000 Wd discharge, will flick off if tripped.
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_IFridge.label: Fridge I/O Port
LanguageData.PRF_IOPort_IFridge.description: (tier 3) \n A Connection port for your DeepStorageUnit. It can be set to Input/output from any DSU remotely in any range within the map. This one also have same option as Rimfidge Coolers.
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.label: Fridge digital storage unit
LanguageData.PRFCoolDSU.description:
Fridge version of Digital Storage Unit, that can store food

Stores up to 512 stacks. Consumes 10 W of power per stack of items. When your colony loses power, items already inside will be safe, but the building will not be able to store more.

This is only available because RimFridge is installed.
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperAtomic.label: Mini RimAtomic station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperAtomic.description: A mini Atomic Workshop helper for RimAtomics to do maintain and fuel your reactors it can flick, haul, atomic, firefight
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperFishing.label: Mini Fishing station
LanguageData.PRF_MiniHelperFishing.description: A mini Fishing Station capable of helping you with catching fish. it will take breaks to prevent curcuits getting too wet.
LanguageData.PRF_T1_Aquaculture.label: Automatic Fish Farm (freshwater)
LanguageData.PRF_T1_Aquaculture.description: An automated aquaculture system that will farm freshwater fish on request.
LanguageData.PRF_T2_Aquaculture.label: Automatic Fish Farm (saltwater)
LanguageData.PRF_T2_Aquaculture.description: An automated aquaculture system that will farm saltwater fish on request.
LanguageData.PRF_FishFood.label: fish food
LanguageData.PRF_FishFood.description: Animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources, used for feeding fish in tanks. Humanoids should not eat this.
